p.dialogue: "It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harvey, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h"
"Sunscreen? Check...#$b#Sun hat? Check..."
"If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin."
"I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!"
"It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.#$b#The trouble is actually letting go of your worries...$s"
"It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water!$h"
"I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties.$s"
"Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... have plans to ask someone else.$s"
"I... I can't look at you. Please spare me any more pain.$s"
"...Y...You...?$s#$b#*gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick...$s"
"I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you.$s"
"I want you back in my life, @. I'm willing to forget what happened.$s"
"We sell a few over-the-counter medicines at the clinic... feel free to stop by if you're feeling exhausted.#$b#I know that being a farmer is pretty tiring work... don't overdo it!"
"I feel responsible for the health of this whole community... it's kind of stressful.#$e#It's a pretty small community, and I'm fortunate to be able to build a good relationship with my patients."
"I'd like to stay in Stardew Valley for a while. I'm finally starting to feel involved in the community.#$e#It feels good to know that you're useful."
"Oh! Hi, @.$l#$e#Do you... have any medical questions?$l"
"Feel free to stop by my office if you're ever feeling ill.#$e#You're young, though. You'll probably stay healthy without trying.$h"
"Don't overwork yourself, @. Doctor's orders!#$e#Your health is important to me.$l"
"I'd like to get to know you better, @. Let's put aside our doctor-patient relationship."
"It's nice to have a friend in town.$h"
"You have a really healthy glow. That's good.$h"
"Remember to cover your mouth when you sneeze.#$e#Then make sure to wash your hands."
"It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.$s#$e#If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.$l"
"Nutrition is important, so make sure and eat well. Try to increase your vegetable intake!#$e#Home-cooked meals are best. Do you cook?"
"It's a beautiful day, isn't it?#$e#I wish I had less work to do.$s"
"If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic."
"Stop by my place if you ever need a confidential check-up.$l"
"Can I do anything for you?#$e#Take care."
"I came here because I liked the small-town atmosphere, and the potential for a holistic approach to patient care.#$e#I've grown to really love it.$h"
"*Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...#$e#The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.$s#$e#I think I'll stay younger with you around.$l"
"Hmm... I'm struggling to make ends meet. I don't have enough patients.#$e#I guess I should try to get patients from the neighboring towns..."
"Imagine having a patient's life completely in your hands, and failing to keep them alive... that's something that will haunt you forever.$s"
"Thanks, @.$h#$b#You see, George, I'm just trying to help you."
"*Sigh*$s#$b#Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy."
"Thanks, @. I appreciate that.$h"
"*Sigh*... rude.$s"
"Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?#$b#Just try and relax. I'm here to help.$h"
"Okay. That makes sense."
"Um. Okay... If you say so.$s"
"...You're right.#$b#...Thanks."
"*sigh*$s"
"It's okay to get a moderate amount of sunlight. Just don't get burnt.#$e#Okay. Take care! Stay healthy."
"Exercise is important, but don't get too exhausted, or you might end up at my clinic!#$e#Make sure and listen to your body."
"People don't get sick much during the summer. That's nice, but it also means less business for me."
"Have you been going into the mines, @?#$e#It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it."
"When you eat certain foods you'll perform better.#$e#Eating a 'Farmer's Brunch' will give you the nutrition you need to water and harvest crops better!"
"It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.#$e#Make sure to wash your hands often."

"I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.#$e#I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.#$e#Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!"
